document_data.mainbody:
Elven sewn gloves were minor enchanted articles of clothing found in the Seldarines Hand citadel on the Spine of the World.
Like many of things crafted by the elves, these gloves were made using cloth and fur of the finest quality. They were hand-sewn by the inhabitants of the Seldarines Hand and quite common during the citadels heyday.
Elven sewn gloves possessed minor enchantments that granter the wearer protection against magical and mundane cold.
After completion of construction of Seldarines Hand circa the , the inhabitants of the citadel lived in a close alliance with the dwarves of Dorns Deep. The troops of the elven citadel were outfitted with the best clothing, armor, and weapons created by the crafters of both peoples. By the , the Seldarines Hand had been ruined for centuries and came to be known as the Severed Hand. Several pairs of elven sewn gloves survived the ravages of time. By the , these gloves could be found in the town of Targos of Icewind Dale, namely, in the hands of Elytharra Dinnesmore, the wife of Speaker Ulbrec Dinnesmore.
